Chapter 2 Initial Set up 2.1 Setting up PsychoPy and Pavlovia We will be building our experiment in PsychoPy and then running them online on Pavlovia. To begin, install PsychoPy on your computer. Once you have PsychoPy set up on your computer, we will begin setting up for Pavlovia. You can also access Pavlovia directly from PsychoPy interface: Figure 2.1: Accessing Pavlovia through PsychoPy.
